search_input: The Writing Images and Picturing Text editor (WIPTe) forms the primary subject of this thesis, as well as its operation and context. The primary focus in constructing this multi-modal instrument together is to facilitate a constant setting within which this thesis is to be written. Therefore turning on itself both as an outline of what it is proposing as a research direction, all the time whilst demonstrating the outcome of its own question, simultaneaously. Therefore it was deemed of importance that WIPT was finished before the final writing stage. This chapter will go through all of the steps of its implementation, whilst continuing to be accompanied by the imagery and textual contexts it puts forward.
suggested_query: This implementation process involved several key stages, including the creation of a custom-built writing environment within the WIPTe software, which utilized a combination of natural language processing and machine learning algorithms to generate a unique writing experience for the user. The writing environment was designed to be highly customizable, allowing the user to tailor the interface and tools to their individual writing style and preferences. Throughout the implementation process, it became clear that the WIPTe software had the potential to not only facilitate the writing process but also to enhance the overall writing experience, by providing a sense of companionship and support to the writer. This was achieved through the use of contextualized imagery and textual prompts, which helped to stimulate the writer's creativity and inspire new ideas.
suggest_context: 3. TEXT EDITOR Companions: The Writing Images and Picturing Text editor WIPTe forms the primary subject of this thesis, as well as its operation and context. Therefore turning on itself both as an outline of what it is proposing as a research direction, all the time whilst demonstrating the outcome of its own question, simultaneaously. This chapter will go through all of the steps of its implementation, whilst continuing to be accompanied by the imagery and textual contexts it puts forward.
